description: **Tool Overview**: Google Chrome releases provide crucial updates and security information related to various vulnerabilities, including CVE-2024-9123. This vulnerability was addressed in the Chromium open-source software that underlies Microsoft Edge. **Details**: Users should visit the Google Chrome releases page to gain insight into the updates that mitigate specific vulnerabilities. The information presented on this page includes details such as the nature of the issues resolved, version numbers, and related security advisories. It is practical for administrators and security professionals to stay informed through this resource to ensure they are applying necessary updates promptly.
